statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 12 \\ -9 \\ 10 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -27 \\ 15 \\ -26 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 75 \\ -48 \\ 68 \\ 41 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
